group_1.textCenter: Appearing in tandem with a Black Card...
To bring happiness to one and all, the Maiden@of Mortality?
Or is she, perhaps, a new variation of@Miss Santa...?

group_1.textRight: A caribou is like a reindeer, right?

group_1.textLeft: She does seem to be kinda Christmasy.

group_1.textRight: A reindeer that brings happiness to everyone!
Think there's a chance we'll see her on the@way to the Christmas party?

group_1.textCenter: *Giggle* Perhaps there is a delivery of@happiness in store for us.

group_1.textLeft: Ah... Now that I think about it...
I'm surprised both of you managed to secure@the time to attend this party together.
(Tsukuyo and Tsukasa are twin sisters who@live separately, after all...)

group_1.narration: — Mifuyu —@(Tsukuyo lives with a prominent family in@Mizuna and undergoes constant training.)
— Mifuyu —@(Her younger sister Tsukasa is the daughter@of a famous artisan in the Kosho Ward.)
— Mifuyu —@(All chores around the studio are hers...)

group_1.textLeft: (The pains they must go through just to@spend time together...)
(They must have worked very hard to pull@this off.)

group_1.textRight: Tsukuyo's got a rare free night today!

group_1.textCenter: Indeed, tonight's practice was canceled due@to a personal request from my instructor.

group_1.textLeft: Well, that sure is a stroke of luck. You're@always so busy.

group_1.textCenter: On the other hand...it's Tsukasa who looks@to be in danger of arriving late.

group_1.textRight: It'll work out, Tsukuyo!
I'm about to go assist my father...
There'll be an event at Namiki Street.
As long as it finishes up when it's supposed@to, I should make it in the nick of time!

group_1.textLeft: As in the place in Sakae Ward known for the@beautiful holiday lights each year?

group_1.textRight: That's the one.

group_1.textLeft: Your father's a well-known bamboo artisan,@isn't he?
Does that mean that he does some kind of@demonstration?

group_1.textRight: Yes, that's right.
The organizers ask him to do a little show@each year.
Actually, I will be wearing this outfit as@his assistant.

group_1.textCenter: You created that costume all by yourself,@right, Tsukasa?

group_1.textRight: Yup! It was really lucky, too.
Since I'd be wearing it at the event...
My dad bought all the fabric and materials@for me!

group_1.textLeft: Then you'll wear it to the party afterward.@Two birds with one stone...

group_1.textRight: We will!
If it looks like the event will run late,@I'll find a way to sneak out.
Well, Tsukuyo. I should get going.

group_1.textLeft: I must be on my way as well.

group_1.textRight: See you at the party tonight!
For sure!
